ThingDef.label: fueled stove
ThingDef.Description: A simple fueled stove with an attached countertop for preparing meals.

ThingDef.label: oven
ThingDef.Description: A stone oven used for baking.

ThingDef.label: fueled food prep table
ThingDef.Description: An unpowered version of the canning stove, food press, and prep table. Makes simple items. Requires 40% work to make items here.

ThingDef.label: fueled smithy
ThingDef.Description: A fueled station equipped for smithing non-mechanical weapons and tools.

ThingDef.label: electric repair bench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped with all the tools required to repair damaged items.

ThingDef.Label: glassworks
ThingDef.Description: A table with all the tools you need to make glass.

ThingDef.Label: reinforced glassworks
ThingDef.Description: A table used for turning normal glass into safety glass.

ThingDef.label: arcade construction table
ThingDef.Description: A work station for assembling arcades, as well as copying cartridge data.

ThingDef.label: painting easel
ThingDef.Description: An easel equipped for artistic painting.

ThingDef.label: writing table
ThingDef.Description: A simple table for writing at.

ThingDef.label: dye barrel
ThingDef.Description: A barrel for dyeing cloth into various colors.

ThingDef.label: rug making table
ThingDef.Description: A table with all the tools needed to make rugs out of various fabrics.

ThingDef.label: fueled generator
ThingDef.description: Produces power by consuming coal, bamboo, or wood. Must be fueled by hand.

ThingDef.label: campfire
ThingDef.description: Cooks meals and produces heat. Burns out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.

ThingDef.label: ccoal campfire test
ThingDef.description: Cooks meals and produces heat. Burns out after a few days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable by wood or coal.
